item.title: Southwest Airlines' upcoming policy for plus-sized passengers panned
item.description: Southwest Airlines will soon require travelers who don't fit within the armrests of their seat to pay for an extra one in advance, part of a string of...

item.title: Mysterious deaths of 21 dogs at boarding facility under investigation
item.description: Authorities said 21 dogs were found dead at Anastasia's Acres Dog Boarding Facility. One dog was found alive and taken to a veterinarian for treatment...

item.title: Woody Allen, slammed by Ukraine for speaking at Russian film festival, responds
item.description: The Ukrainian Foreign Ministry condemned Woody Allen for speaking virtually at a Russian film festival, calling his participation "a disgrace and an i...

item.title: Plea scrawled in blood saves woman trapped 30 hours in locked room
item.description: A Chinese woman was finally rescued from a locked room thanks to her plea for help, written in her own blood on pillow thrown from a window.

item.title: Maps show Tropical Storm Fernand's path and forecast in Atlantic
item.description: Fernand is the sixth named storm of the 2025 Atlantic hurricane season.
